sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN ((CASE WHEN En.EnableCpuLoad='1' AND Cpu.EnableCpuTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN En.EnableMemLoad='1' AND  Mem.EnableMemTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN En.EnableNetLoad='1' AND Net.EnableNetTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN En.EnableStorLoad='1' AND Stor.EnableStorTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_CpuTestCriteria AS Cpu, CS_MemTestCriteria AS Mem, CS_NetTestCriteria AS Net, CS_StorTestCriteria AS Stor, CS_EnableTestLoad AS En

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_Events (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, SessionId, Event, EventDescription, EventText, EventTextShort, Iteration, CurrVal, BllTimestamp, CpuLoadAcceptableVariance, MemReadRateAcceptableVariance, MemReadRateAcceptableLatency, MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance, MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency, NetReadRateAcceptableVariance, NetReadRateAcceptableLatency, NetWriteRateAcceptableVariance, NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency, StorReadRateAcceptableVariance, StorReadRateAcceptableLatency, StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance, StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NodesPerModel (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, CloudTemplateModelHnd, NodesPerModel)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_ReservedInstances (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, CloudTemplateModelHnd, ReservedInstances)

SELECT TM.Handle AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, COUNT(DISTINCT CTN.Handle) AS NodesPerModel FROM CloudTemplateModel AS TM, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='ParentChild' AND CTN.ParentHnd = TM.Handle GROUP BY TM.Handle

SELECT TM.Handle AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, COUNT(*) AS ReservedInstances FROM CloudTemplateModel AS TM, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedCloudStressSession' AND CTI.Handle = RT.SourceHnd AND CTI.ParentHnd = TM.Handle GROUP BY TM.Handle

sql_statement.static: DELETE FROM CS_IteratorState
INSERT INTO CS_IteratorState (Iteration, CurrVal) VALUES (

SELECT Iter.Iteration AS Iteration, Iter.CurrVal AS CurrVal, (CASE WHEN En.EnableCpuLoad=1 THEN (Cpu.MinCpuLoad + ((Cpu.MaxCpuLoad - Cpu.MinCpuLoad) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal)) ELSE 0 END) AS CpuLoad, (CASE WHEN En.EnableMemLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Mem.MinReadRate + ((Mem.MaxReadRate - Mem.MinReadRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS MemReadRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableMemLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Mem.MinWriteRate + ((Mem.MaxWriteRate - Mem.MinWriteRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS MemWriteRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableNetLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Net.MinReadRate + ((Net.MaxReadRate - Net.MinReadRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS NetReadRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableNetLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Net.MinWriteRate + ((Net.MaxWriteRate - Net.MinWriteRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS NetWriteRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableStorLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Stor.MinReadRate + ((Stor.MaxReadRate - Stor.MinReadRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS StorReadRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableStorLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Stor.MinWriteRate + ((Stor.MaxWriteRate - Stor.MinWriteRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS StorWriteRate FROM CpuLoadConfig AS Cpu, MemoryLoadConfig AS Mem, NetworkLoadConfig AS Net, StorageLoadConfig AS Stor, CS_IteratorState AS Iter, CS_EnableTestLoad AS En WHERE Cpu.ID = Mem.ID AND Cpu.ID = Net.ID AND Cpu.ID = Stor.ID

sql_statement.static: UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET CpuLoad=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableCpuLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN ROUND(Load.CpuLoad, 2) ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), MemReadRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableMemLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.MemReadRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), MemWriteRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableMemLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.MemWriteRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), NetReadRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableNetLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.NetReadRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), NetWriteRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableNetLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.NetWriteRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), StorReadRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableStorLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.StorReadRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), StorWriteRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableStorLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.StorWriteRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)

SELECT IterationNum, IteratorCurrVal, InstanceHnd, ThresholdResultsHnd, True, False, ROUND((True / (True + False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM CpuLoadIteration WHERE IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)
SELECT ID, MinCpuLoad, MaxCpuLoad, TemplateId, NodeId, MachineGroupIndex, MachineIndex, NodeName, LoadProfileName FROM CpuLoadConfig

Properties.Value: Run SQL: Verify Received Agent CPU Load Results (table rows per template)

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ResCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) != COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ResCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd)

SELECT 'CPU' AS Dimension, 'Load Variance' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT MachineSetHnd, group_concat(MachineSetName), ResourceId, CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount

Properties.Value: Run SQL: Verify Received Agent CPU Load Results (at least one measurement reported)

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ErrCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (Res.True + Res.False) >=1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ErrCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR WHERE TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) < 1)

SELECT 'CPU' AS Dimension, 'Load Variance' AS Measurement, Map.MachineSetName AS Template, TR.AgentHostname AS Agent FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_MachineSetInstanceMap AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) < 1

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_CpuLoadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, CpuLoad, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudCpuLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT LoadIter.IterationNum AS Iteration, LoadIter.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.CpuLoad AS CpuLoad, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, LoadIter.True AS True, LoadIter.False AS False, LoadIter.True + LoadIter.False AS TotalMeasurements, LoadIter.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - LoadIter.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, TestCriteria.CpuLoadVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN LoadIter.False/(LoadIter.True + LoadIter.False) * 100.0 >= TestCriteria.CpuLoadVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, LoadIter.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, LoadIter.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudCpuLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS LoadIter, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.Utilization AS CpuLoad FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudCpuLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND LoadIter.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=LoadIter.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_CpuLoadVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

SELECT (SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS Iteration, (SELECT Iter.CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS CurrVal, Map.CpuProfileName AS ProfileName, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, ROUND(LP.Utilization, 2) AS CpuLoad FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudCpuLoadProfile AS LP, (SELECT LP.Handle AS LpHnd, Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AS CtnHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudCpuLoadProfile AS LP WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle) AS LpMap WHERE LpMap.CtnHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND LP.Handle=LpMap.LpHnd
SELECT Iteration, CurrVal, ProfileName, ModelName, NodeName, CpuLoad FROM CS_CpuLoadProfSum

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterCpuLoadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.CpuProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(Res.CpuLoad, 2) AS CpuLoad, ROUND(TD.AvgVal * 100.0, 2) AS ActualAvgCpuLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, ROUND(Res.CpuLoad - (Res.CpuLoad * Res.AcceptableVariance / 100.0), 2) AS MinAcceptableCpuLoad FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentCpuSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='CPU_UTILIZATION' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET CpuVerdict=(SELECT Res.IterVerdict FROM CS_IterCpuLoadVarRealTimeResults AS Res, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Res.Iteration=Iter.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)

SELECT MemReadVar.IterationNum AS IterationNum, MemReadVar.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, MemReadVar.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, MemReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, MemReadVar.True AS True, MemReadVar.False AS False, ROUND((MemReadVar.True / (MemReadVar.True + MemReadVar.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM MemoryReadVariance AS MemReadVar WHERE MemReadVar.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT MemReadLat.IterationNum AS IterationNum, MemReadLat.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, MemReadLat.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, MemReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, MemReadLat.True AS True, MemReadLat.False AS False, ROUND((MemReadLat.True / (MemReadLat.True + MemReadLat.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM MemoryReadLatency AS MemReadLat WHERE MemReadLat.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT MemWriteVar.IterationNum AS IterationNum, MemWriteVar.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, MemWriteVar.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, MemWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, MemWriteVar.True AS True, MemWriteVar.False AS False, ROUND((MemWriteVar.True / (MemWriteVar.True + MemWriteVar.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM MemoryWriteVariance AS MemWriteVar WHERE MemWriteVar.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_MemReadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, MemReadRate, MemReadSize, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudMemoryLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT MemReadVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, MemReadVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.ReadRate AS MemReadRate, JT.ReadSize AS MemReadSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, MemReadVar.True AS True, MemReadVar.False AS False, MemReadVar.True + MemReadVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, MemReadVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - MemReadVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.MemReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN MemReadVar.False/(MemReadVar.True + MemReadVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.MemReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, MemReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, MemReadVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudMemoryLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_MemReadVar AS MemReadVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.ReadsPerSec AS ReadRate, LP.ReadSize AS ReadSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudMemoryLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND MemReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=MemReadVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_MemWriteLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

SELECT (SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS Iteration, (SELECT Iter.CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS CurrVal, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, LP.ReadsPerSec AS MemReadRate, LP.WritesPerSec AS MemWriteRate, LP.ReadSize AS MemReadSize, LP.WriteSize AS MemWriteSize FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudMemoryLoadProfile AS LP, (SELECT LP.Handle AS LpHnd, Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AS CtnHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudMemoryLoadProfile AS LP WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle) AS LpMap WHERE LpMap.CtnHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND LP.Handle=LpMap.LpHnd
SELECT Iteration, CurrVal, ProfileName, ModelName, NodeName, MemReadRate, MemReadSize, MemWriteRate, MemWriteSize FROM CS_MemLoadProfSum

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterMemReadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterMemReadLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterMemWriteVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterMemWriteLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(Res.MemReadRate, 2) AS MemReadRate, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT) / LoadConf.ReadSize, 2) AS ActualAvgMemReadLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, ROUND(Res.MemReadRate - (Res.MemReadRate * Res.AcceptableVariance / 100.0), 2) AS MinAcceptableMemReadRate FROM CS_MemReadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentMemSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, MemoryLoadConfig as LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_READ_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgMemReadLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_MemReadLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentMemSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_READ_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(Res.MemWriteRate, 2) AS MemWriteRate, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT) / LoadConf.WriteSize, 2) AS ActualAvgMemWriteLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, ROUND(Res.MemWriteRate - (Res.MemWriteRate * Res.AcceptableVariance / 100.0), 2) AS MinAcceptableMemWriteRate FROM CS_MemWriteVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentMemSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, MemoryLoadConfig as LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_WRITE_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgMemWriteLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0 , 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_MemWriteLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentMemSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_WRITE_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET MemVerdict=(SELECT (CASE WHEN ReadVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR ReadLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END) FROM CS_IterMemReadVarRealTimeResults AS ReadVar, CS_IterMemReadLatRealTimeResults AS ReadLat, CS_IterMemWriteVarRealTimeResults AS WriteVar, CS_IterMemWriteLatRealTimeResults AS WriteLat, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Iter.Iteration=ReadVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=ReadLat.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteLat.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)

ExpressionCommand.Name: Test Methodology: Run SQL Command

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN EnableNetLoad='0' THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN EnableNetTestCriteria='False' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) END FROM CS_EnableTestLoad, CS_TestCriteria

SELECT NetReadLat.IterationNum AS IterationNum, NetReadLat.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, NetReadLat.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, NetReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetReadLat.True AS True, NetReadLat.False AS False, ROUND((NetReadLat.True / (NetReadLat.True + NetReadLat.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM NetworkReadLatency AS NetReadLat WHERE NetReadLat.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT NetWriteLat.IterationNum AS IterationNum, NetWriteLat.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, NetWriteLat.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, NetWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetWriteLat.True AS True, NetWriteLat.False AS False, ROUND((NetWriteLat.True / (NetWriteLat.True + NetWriteLat.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM NetworkWriteLatency AS NetWriteLat WHERE NetWriteLat.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ResCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) != COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ResCount FROM CS_NetReadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd)

SELECT 'Network' AS Dimension, 'Read Variance' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_NetReadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT MachineSetHnd, group_concat(MachineSetName), ResourceId, CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetReadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, NetReadRate, NetReadSize, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudNetworkLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT NetReadVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, NetReadVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.ReadRate AS NetReadRate, JT.ReadSize AS NetReadSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, NetReadVar.True AS True, NetReadVar.False AS False, NetReadVar.True + NetReadVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, NetReadVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - NetReadVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.NetReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN NetReadVar.False/(NetReadVar.True + NetReadVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.NetReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, NetReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetReadVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudNetworkLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_NetReadVar AS NetReadVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.ReadsPerSec AS ReadRate, LP.ReadSize AS ReadSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudNetworkLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND NetReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=NetReadVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetReadVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_NetReadVarResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_NetReadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetReadLatResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, NetReadRate, NetReadSize, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudNetworkLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT NetReadLat.IterationNum AS Iteration, NetReadLat.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.ReadRate AS NetReadRate, JT.ReadSize AS NetReadSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, NetReadLat.True AS True, NetReadLat.False AS False, NetReadLat.True + NetReadLat.False AS TotalMeasurements, NetReadLat.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - NetReadLat.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, TRC.Threshold AS AcceptableLatency, CS_TestCriteria.NetReadRateLatencySuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN NetReadLat.False/(NetReadLat.True + NetReadLat.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.NetReadRateLatencySuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, NetReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetReadLat.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudNetworkLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_NetReadLat AS NetReadLat, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.ReadsPerSec AS ReadRate, LP.ReadSize AS ReadSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudNetworkLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND NetReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=NetReadLat.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetReadLatSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_NetReadLatResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_NetReadLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetWriteVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, NetWriteRate, NetWriteSize, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudNetworkLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT NetWriteVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, NetWriteVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.WriteRate AS NetWriteRate, JT.WriteSize AS NetWriteSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, NetWriteVar.True AS True, NetWriteVar.False AS False, NetWriteVar.True + NetWriteVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, NetWriteVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - NetWriteVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.NetWriteRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN NetWriteVar.False/(NetWriteVar.True + NetWriteVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.NetWriteRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, NetWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetWriteVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudNetworkLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_NetWriteVar AS NetWriteVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.WritesPerSec AS WriteRate, LP.WriteSize AS WriteSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudNetworkLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND NetWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=NetWriteVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetWriteVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_NetWriteVarResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_NetWriteVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetWriteLatResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, NetWriteRate, NetWriteSize, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudNetworkLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT NetWriteLat.IterationNum AS Iteration, NetWriteLat.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.WriteRate AS NetWriteRate, JT.WriteSize AS NetWriteSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, NetWriteLat.True AS True, NetWriteLat.False AS False, NetWriteLat.True + NetWriteLat.False AS TotalMeasurements, NetWriteLat.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - NetWriteLat.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, TRC.Threshold AS AcceptableLatency, CS_TestCriteria.NetWriteRateLatencySuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN NetWriteLat.False/(NetWriteLat.True + NetWriteLat.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.NetWriteRateLatencySuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, NetWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetWriteLat.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudNetworkLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_NetWriteLat AS NetWriteLat, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.WritesPerSec AS WriteRate, LP.WriteSize AS WriteSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudNetworkLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND NetWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=NetWriteLat.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetWriteLatSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_NetWriteLatResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_NetWriteLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

SELECT (SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS Iteration, (SELECT Iter.CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS CurrVal, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, LP.ReadsPerSec AS NetReadRate, LP.WritesPerSec AS NetWriteRate, LP.ReadSize AS NetReadSize, LP.WriteSize AS NetWriteSize FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudNetworkLoadProfile AS LP, (SELECT LP.Handle AS LpHnd, Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AS CtnHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudNetworkLoadProfile AS LP WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle) AS LpMap WHERE LpMap.CtnHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND LP.Handle=LpMap.LpHnd
SELECT Iteration, CurrVal, ProfileName, ModelName, NodeName, NetReadRate, NetReadSize, NetWriteRate, NetWriteSize FROM CS_NetLoadProfSum

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterNetReadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterNetReadLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterNetWriteVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterNetWriteLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(Res.NetReadRate, 2) AS NetReadRate, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT) / LoadConf.ReadSize, 2) AS ActualAvgNetReadLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, ROUND(Res.NetReadRate - (Res.NetReadRate * Res.AcceptableVariance / 100.0), 2) AS MinAcceptableNetReadRate FROM CS_NetReadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentNetSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, NetworkLoadConfig as LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='NETWORK_READ_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgNetReadLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_NetReadLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentNetSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='NETWORK_READ_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(Res.NetWriteRate, 2) AS NetWriteRate, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT) / LoadConf.WriteSize, 2) AS ActualAvgNetWriteLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, ROUND(Res.NetWriteRate - (Res.NetWriteRate * Res.AcceptableVariance / 100.0), 2) AS MinAcceptableNetWriteRate FROM CS_NetWriteVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentNetSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, NetworkLoadConfig AS LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='NETWORK_WRITE_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgNetWriteLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_NetWriteLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentNetSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='NETWORK_WRITE_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET NetVerdict=(SELECT (CASE WHEN ReadVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR ReadLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END) FROM CS_IterNetReadVarRealTimeResults AS ReadVar, CS_IterNetReadLatRealTimeResults AS ReadLat, CS_IterNetWriteVarRealTimeResults AS WriteVar, CS_IterNetWriteLatRealTimeResults AS WriteLat, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Iter.Iteration=ReadVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=ReadLat.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteLat.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)

ExpressionCommand.Name: Test Methodology: Run SQL Command

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN EnableStorLoad='0' THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN EnableStorTestCriteria='False' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) END FROM CS_EnableTestLoad, CS_TestCriteria

sql_statement.static: SELECT TD.AgentHostname, TD.Statistic, TD.MinVal, TD.MaxVal, TD.AvgVal FROM Tdigest_AgentIterSummStats AS TD WHERE TD.Iteration=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND TD.Statistic IN ('BLOCK_READ_RATE', 'BLOCK_READ_LATENCY', 'BLOCK_WRITE_RATE', 'BLOCK_WRITE_LATENCY', 'BLOCK_READ_VARIANCE', 'BLOCK_WRITE_VARIANCE')

SELECT StorReadVar.IterationNum AS IterationNum, StorReadVar.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, StorReadVar.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, StorReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorReadVar.True AS True, StorReadVar.False AS False, ROUND((StorReadVar.True / (StorReadVar.True + StorReadVar.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM StorageReadVariance AS StorReadVar WHERE StorReadVar.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT StorReadLat.IterationNum AS IterationNum, StorReadLat.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, StorReadLat.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, StorReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorReadLat.True AS True, StorReadLat.False AS False, ROUND((StorReadLat.True / (StorReadLat.True + StorReadLat.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM StorageReadLatency AS StorReadLat WHERE StorReadLat.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT StorWriteVar.IterationNum AS IterationNum, StorWriteVar.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, StorWriteVar.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, StorWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorWriteVar.True AS True, StorWriteVar.False AS False, ROUND((StorWriteVar.True / (StorWriteVar.True + StorWriteVar.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM StorageWriteVariance AS StorWriteVar WHERE StorWriteVar.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT StorWriteLat.IterationNum AS IterationNum, StorWriteLat.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, StorWriteLat.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, StorWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorWriteLat.True AS True, StorWriteLat.False AS False, ROUND((StorWriteLat.True / (StorWriteLat.True + StorWriteLat.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM StorageWriteLatency AS StorWriteLat WHERE StorWriteLat.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT ID, MinReadRate, MaxReadRate, MinWriteRate, MaxWriteRate, ReadSize, WriteSize, TargetDevice, EnableFileSize, FileSize, TemplateId, NodeId, MachineGroupIndex, MachineIndex, NodeName, LoadProfileName FROM StorageLoadConfig
SELECT AgentHostname, Iteration, Statistic, MinVal, MaxVal, AvgVal FROM Tdigest_AgentIterSummStats WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND Statistic LIKE 'BLOCK%'

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ResCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) != COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ResCount FROM CS_StorReadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd)

SELECT 'Storage' AS Dimension, 'Read Variance' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_StorReadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT MachineSetHnd, group_concat(MachineSetName), ResourceId, CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ErrCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (Res.True + Res.False) >=1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ErrCount FROM CS_StorReadVar AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR WHERE TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) < 1)

SELECT 'Storage' AS Dimension, 'Read Variance' AS Measurement, Map.MachineSetName AS Template,TR.AgentHostname AS Agent FROM CS_StorReadVar AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_MachineSetInstanceMap AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) < 1

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ResCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) != COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ResCount FROM CS_StorReadLat AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd)

SELECT 'Storage' AS Dimension, 'Read Latency' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_StorReadLat AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT MachineSetHnd, group_concat(MachineSetName), ResourceId, CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorReadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, StorReadRate, StorReadSize, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudStorageLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT StorReadVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, StorReadVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.ReadRate AS StorReadRate, JT.ReadSize AS StorReadSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, StorReadVar.True AS True, StorReadVar.False AS False, StorReadVar.True + StorReadVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, StorReadVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - StorReadVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.StorReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN StorReadVar.False/(StorReadVar.True + StorReadVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.StorReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, StorReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorReadVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudStorageLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_StorReadVar AS StorReadVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.ReadsPerSec AS ReadRate, LP.ReadSize AS ReadSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudStorageLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND StorReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=StorReadVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorReadVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_StorReadVarResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_StorReadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

SELECT StorReadLat.IterationNum AS Iteration, StorReadLat.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.ReadRate AS StorReadRate, JT.ReadSize AS StorReadSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, StorReadLat.True AS True, StorReadLat.False AS False, StorReadLat.True + StorReadLat.False AS TotalMeasurements, StorReadLat.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - StorReadLat.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, TRC.Threshold AS AcceptableLatency, CS_TestCriteria.StorReadRateLatencySuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN StorReadLat.False/(StorReadLat.True + StorReadLat.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.StorReadRateLatencySuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, StorReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorReadLat.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudStorageLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_StorReadLat AS StorReadLat, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.ReadsPerSec AS ReadRate, LP.ReadSize AS ReadSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudStorageLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND StorReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=StorReadLat.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorReadLatSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_StorReadLatResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_StorReadLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model
