SELECT StorWriteVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, StorWriteVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.WriteRate AS StorWriteRate, JT.WriteSize AS StorWriteSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, StorWriteVar.True AS True, StorWriteVar.False AS False, StorWriteVar.True + StorWriteVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, StorWriteVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - StorWriteVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.StorWriteRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN StorWriteVar.False/(StorWriteVar.True + StorWriteVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.StorWriteRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, StorWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorWriteVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudStorageLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_StorWriteVar AS StorWriteVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.WritesPerSec AS WriteRate, LP.WriteSize AS WriteSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudStorageLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND StorWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=StorWriteVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorWriteVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_StorWriteVarResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_StorWriteVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorWriteLatResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, StorWriteRate, StorWriteSize, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudStorageLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT StorWriteLat.IterationNum AS Iteration, StorWriteLat.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.WriteRate AS StorWriteRate, JT.WriteSize AS StorWriteSize, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, StorWriteLat.True AS True, StorWriteLat.False AS False, StorWriteLat.True + StorWriteLat.False AS TotalMeasurements, StorWriteLat.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - StorWriteLat.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, TRC.Threshold AS AcceptableLatency, CS_TestCriteria.StorWriteRateLatencySuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN StorWriteLat.False/(StorWriteLat.True + StorWriteLat.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.StorWriteRateLatencySuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, StorWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorWriteLat.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudStorageLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_StorWriteLat AS StorWriteLat, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.WritesPerSec AS WriteRate, LP.WriteSize AS WriteSize FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudStorageLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND StorWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=StorWriteLat.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorWriteLatSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_StorWriteLatResults AS Res

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_StorWriteLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

SELECT (SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS Iteration, (SELECT Iter.CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS CurrVal, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, LP.ReadsPerSec AS StorReadRate, LP.WritesPerSec AS StorWriteRate, LP.ReadSize AS StorReadSize, LP.WriteSize AS StorWriteSize FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudStorageLoadProfile AS LP, (SELECT LP.Handle AS LpHnd, Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AS CtnHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudStorageLoadProfile AS LP WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle) AS LpMap WHERE LpMap.CtnHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND LP.Handle=LpMap.LpHnd
SELECT Iteration, CurrVal, ProfileName, ModelName, NodeName, StorReadRate, StorReadSize, StorWriteRate, StorWriteSize FROM CS_StorLoadProfSum

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterStorReadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterStorReadLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterStorWriteVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterStorWriteLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(Res.StorReadRate, 2) AS StorReadRate, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT) / LoadConf.ReadSize, 2) AS ActualAvgStorReadLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, ROUND(Res.StorReadRate - (Res.StorReadRate * Res.AcceptableVariance / 100.0), 2) AS MinAcceptableStorReadRate FROM CS_StorReadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentStorSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, StorageLoadConfig as LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='BLOCK_READ_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgStorReadLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_StorReadLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentStorSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='BLOCK_READ_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(Res.StorWriteRate, 2) AS StorWriteRate, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT) / LoadConf.WriteSize, 2) AS ActualAvgStorWriteLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, ROUND(Res.StorWriteRate - (Res.StorWriteRate * Res.AcceptableVariance / 100.0), 2) AS MinAcceptableStorWriteRate FROM CS_StorWriteVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentStorSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, StorageLoadConfig AS LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='BLOCK_WRITE_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgStorWriteLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Res.AcceptableLatency AS MaxAcceptableStorWriteLat FROM CS_StorWriteLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentStorSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='BLOCK_WRITE_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET StorVerdict=(SELECT (CASE WHEN ReadVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR ReadLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END) FROM CS_IterStorReadVarRealTimeResults AS ReadVar, CS_IterStorReadLatRealTimeResults AS ReadLat, CS_IterStorWriteVarRealTimeResults AS WriteVar, CS_IterStorWriteLatRealTimeResults AS WriteLat, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Iter.Iteration=ReadVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=ReadLat.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteLat.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET IterVerdict=(SELECT CASE WHEN Verd.CpuVerdict='FAIL' OR Verd.MemVerdict='FAIL' OR Verd.NetVerdict='FAIL' OR Verd.StorVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END FROM CS_VerdictSummary AS Verd, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Iter.Iteration=Verd.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)

sql_statement.static: SELECT Token.SecurityToken AS SessionId, 'end_iteration' AS Event, 'End Iteration' AS EventDescription, ('End Iteration (' || Iter.CurrVal || '% Search Space)') AS EventTextShort, ('End Iteration (' || Iter.CurrVal || '% Search Space)') AS EventText, Iter.Iteration AS Iteration, Iter.CurrVal AS CurrVal, strftime('%s','now') AS BllTimestamp, Criteria.CpuLoadAcceptableVariance AS CpuLoadAcceptableVariance, Criteria.MemReadRateAcceptableVariance AS MemReadRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.MemReadRateAcceptableLatency AS MemReadRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance AS MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.NetReadRateAcceptableVariance AS NetReadRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.NetReadRateAcceptableLatency AS NetReadRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.NetWriteRateAcceptableVariance AS NetWriteRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.StorReadRateAcceptableVariance AS StorReadRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.StorReadRateAcceptableLatency AS StorReadRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance AS StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter, CS_TestCriteria AS Criteria, CS_SecurityToken AS Token

sql_statement.static: SELECT Events.SessionId AS SessionId, Events.Event AS Event, Events.EventDescription AS EventDescription, Events.EventTextShort AS EventTextShort, Events.EventText AS EventText, Events.Iteration AS Iteration, Events.CurrVal AS CurrVal, Events.BllTimestamp AS BllTimestamp, CAST(Events.CpuLoadAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS CpuLoadAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS MemReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS MemReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS MemWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.NetReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS NetReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.NetReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS NetReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.NetWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS NetWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.StorReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS StorReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.StorReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS StorReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS StorWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency FROM CS_Events AS Events, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Events.Iteration=Iter.Iteration AND Events.Event='end_iteration'

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_LoadIteratorResult (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IsConverged BOOLEAN, ConvergedVal REAL, Iteration INTEGER, CurrVal REAL)

SELECT IterCmd.IsConverged AS IsConverged, IterCmd.ConvergedVal AS ConvergedVal, IterCmd.Iteration AS Iteration, IterCmd.CurrVal AS CurrVal FROM (SELECT SourceHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE Type='UserTag' AND TargetHnd=(SELECT Handle FROM Tag WHERE Name='IteratorCommand')) AS TaggedObjs, spirent_methodology_RateIteratorCommand AS IterCmd WHERE IterCmd.Handle=TaggedObjs.SourceHnd

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN EnableCpuLoad='0' THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN EnableCpuTestCriteria='False' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) END FROM CS_EnableTestLoad, CS_TestCriteria

SELECT LoadConf.LoadProfileName AS LoadProfileName, LoadConf.TemplateId AS TemplateId, CASE WHEN LoadConf.TemplateId='' THEN '---' ELSE (SELECT ModelDispName FROM CS_ProfileMap WHERE ModelResId=LoadConf.TemplateId) END AS TemplateName, CASE WHEN LoadConf.TemplateId='' AND LoadConf.NodeId='' THEN '---' ELSE CASE WHEN NodeId='' THEN '---' ELSE LoadConf.NodeName END END AS NodeName, CASE WHEN IterRes.IsConverged=1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS IsConverged, ROUND(((LoadConf.MaxCpuLoad-LoadConf.MinCpuLoad) * (CASE WHEN IterRes.IsConverged=1 THEN IterRes.ConvergedVal ELSE IterRes.CurrVal END) / 100.0 + LoadConf.MinCpuLoad), 2) AS CpuLoad FROM CS_LoadIteratorResult AS IterRes, CpuLoadConfig AS LoadConf

ExpressionCommand.Name: Check if there are credentials

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VM_Snapshot_Start (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FlavorId STRING, FlavorName, Count INTEGER, CpuCores INTEGER, MemoryMb INTEGER, DiskInfo)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VM_Snapshot_End (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FlavorId STRING, FlavorName, Count INTEGER, CpuCores INTEGER, MemoryMb INTEGER, DiskInfo)

SELECT Info.FlavorId, Info.FlavorName, Info.Count, Info.CpuCores, Info.MemoryMb, GROUP_CONCAT(PRINTF('%s: %s %s', DiskInfo.Name, DiskInfo.Size, DiskInfo.SizeUnit), ', ') AS 'DiskInfo' FROM vm_snapshot_start_info AS Info, vm_snapshot_start_disk_info AS DiskInfo WHERE Info.FlavorId=DiskInfo.FlavorId GROUP BY Info.FlavorName ORDER BY Info.FlavorName, DiskInfo.DiskIndex

SELECT Info.FlavorId, Info.FlavorName, Info.Count, Info.CpuCores, Info.MemoryMb, GROUP_CONCAT(PRINTF('%s: %s %s', DiskInfo.Name, DiskInfo.Size, DiskInfo.SizeUnit), ', ') AS 'DiskInfo' FROM vm_snapshot_end_info AS Info, vm_snapshot_end_disk_info AS DiskInfo WHERE Info.FlavorId=DiskInfo.FlavorId GROUP BY Info.FlavorName ORDER BY Info.FlavorName, DiskInfo.DiskIndex

report.explanation: Summary of VM Snapshot information.
report.display_name: Running VMs Not Included in Test

sql_statement.static: SELECT Start.FlavorName AS 'Name', Start.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Start.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Start.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', Start.Count AS 'Start Count', (End.Count - Start.Count) AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_Start AS Start, VM_Snapshot_End AS End WHERE Start.FlavorId=End.FlavorId
UNION

SELECT Info.FlavorName AS 'Name', Info.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Info.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Info.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', Info.Count AS 'Start Count', PRINTF('-%d', Info.Count) AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_Start AS Info WHERE Info.FlavorId NOT IN (SELECT FlavorId FROM VM_Snapshot_End)
UNION

SELECT Info.FlavorName AS 'Name', Info.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Info.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Info.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', 0 AS 'Start Count', Info.Count AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_End AS Info WHERE Info.FlavorId NOT IN (SELECT FlavorId FROM VM_Snapshot_Start)

Note that the Templates are deployed serially; the BatchSize further breaks up the agents in a Template to reduce the load on the server.
